profile.name: Tayathorn
profile.bio: Experienced developer in mobile application with native and cross platform such as Obj-C, Swift and React Native with some experience in backend development using Node.js. Familiar and comfortable in Scrum team and MVP working environment.

education.school: King Mongkut University of Technology Thonburi

work_history.position: Senior Software Engineer at THiNKNET Co., Ltd
description: Improved and implemented iOS and android applications using React Native.
Collaborated with other team for planning, designing and developing applications architecture for both frontend and backend.
Taught basic React Native to other engineering team members.
Built iOS applications for beta testing via TestFlight.

work_history.position: Junior Software Engineer at THiNKNET Co., Ltd
description: Improved and implemented iOS applications using swift language including UI testing (MVC Architecture) for 1 year.
Worked with in scrum team for 1 year then changed to MVP environment.
Researched, improved and implemented mobile applications with React Native (cross platform, iOS & Android).
Worked with other team in Node.js backend development.

work_history.position: Junior Application Developer at Wealth Management System Limited Co., Ltd
description: Developed and implemented web application using ASP.NET.
